description:
InContact Plus enables you to quickly call, email, IM, or TXT your frequently used contacts with only 2 taps.  Simply add your friends, family, and coworkers, set up to 4 actions (email, SMS, call, IM) for each and get "in contact!"

Features include:

 - Unlimited pages of contacts,
 - Email or SMS an entire page,
 - Email and SMS groups,
 - Customizable icons to launch the Palm dialer, email, messaging and contact applications,
 - Animated draggable photos to reorder display,
 - 4 customizable actions (phone, email, IM, or SMS) for each contact,
 - Default action for each contact,
 - Selection of 6 themes plus a custom theme,
 - Selection of default, transparent, and "phone" launcher icons,
 - Close on dial or any other action,
 - Support for portrait & landscape display modes, and
 - "Driving Mode" with larger icons that are easier to find & tap.

Available in: English.
